put.description: (Cluster only) Add a plugin (or upgrade an existing one) to the server via 'location'

parameters.name: plugin location
parameters.description: Location in the local file system

200.description: Successfully installed '${installResponse.message}'. Reloading server, please wait a moment.

400.description:
Failed to install plugin.  Error: ${installResponse.message}

OR

Path query must be a directory.

OR

Name queries not yet supported.

OR

500.description: Could not complete new plugin scan.

get.summary: import of org.zowe.terminal.proxy:vtdata

200.description: This is a placeholder because the plugin did not supply a swagger document

get.summary: Get a JSON resource, listing, or binary file from the plugin scope
get.description: Returns a binary or JSON resource or a collection of JSON subresources. JSON resources are aggregated with broader scopes according to plugin definition. Whether the resource is JSON or binary also is according to the plugin definition. Can return a listing rather than content by use of query parameter.

parameters.name: plugin
parameters.description: Plugin ID for plugin installed on App server

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The name of a JSON or binary storage item, possibly containing subresources. Each resource's details are defined in the plugin definition.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Retrieves a named subresource when resource given is not a leaf

parameters.name: listing
parameters.description: Returns a list of subresources, rather than their contents

204.description: Resource can exist but has not yet been made

400.description: Resource, plugin, or scope, or plugin definition not valid

get.description: Get the log of the agent

get.summary: Get a JSON resource, listing, or binary file from the user scope or higher
get.description: Returns a binary or JSON resource or a collection of JSON subresources. JSON resources are aggregated with broader scopes according to plugin definition. Whether the resource is JSON or binary also is according to the plugin definition. Can return a listing rather than content by use of query parameter. The user scope determines which user's data to lookup via the session info.

parameters.name: plugin
parameters.description: Plugin ID for plugin installed on App server

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The name of a JSON or binary storage item, possibly containing subresources. Each resource's details are defined in the plugin definition.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Retrieves a named subresource when resource given is not a leaf

parameters.name: listing
parameters.description: Returns a list of subresources, rather than their contents

204.description: Resource can exist but has not yet been made

400.description: Resource, plugin, or scope, or plugin definition not valid

put.summary: Writes a JSON or binary resource to the user's storage area
put.description: Writes either a binary or JSON resource according to the plugin definition. The user scope determines which user's data to lookup via the session info.

parameters.name: plugin
parameters.description: Plugin ID for plugin installed on App server

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The name of a JSON or binary storage item, possibly containing subresources. Each resource's details are defined in the plugin definition.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Writes a named subresource when resource given is not a leaf

400.description: Resource, plugin, or scope, or plugin definition not valid

delete.summary: Deletes a resource from the multi-server instance storage area
delete.description: Deletes a resource, and optionally its subresources.

parameters.name: plugin
parameters.description: Plugin ID for plugin installed on App server

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The name of a JSON or binary storage item, possibly containing subresources. Each resource's details are defined in the plugin definition.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Deletes a named subresource when resource given is not a leaf

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Whether or not to delete subresources recursively

400.description: Resource, plugin, or scope, or plugin definition not valid
